channel.title: Running the Workshop at an AWS Guided Event on English
channel.description: Recent content in Running the Workshop at an AWS Guided Event on English

item.title: Join the workshop event
item.description:
If you are joining an AWS-hosted event, you will use a platform named AWS Workshop Studio. This platform allows AWS field teams to run Workshops, Game Days, Boot camps, Immersion Days, and other events that require hands-on access to AWS accounts or resources.

Follow the steps below to gain access to your Workshop Studio AWS account:

Step 1: Go to Workshop Studio

Access your workshop here: Workshop Studio

Step 2:. Choose Sign-In method.

item.title: Accessing your IDE
item.description:
Access your cloud-based code-server IDE

For this workshop, you’ll use Visual Studio Code running on an Amazon EC2 instance via code-server. This provides a consistent development environment with all tools pre-configured.

  1. Open the Workshop Studio event dashboard

  2. Navigate to the Event Outputs panel at the bottom of the page.

  3. Copy the Password ðŸ”‘ - you’ll need this to authenticate.

  4. Click on the URL to open your cloud IDE in a new tab.
